text: evarkal tavrat (vetam) cumattapperru pinnar atanpati natakkavillaiyo, avarkalukku utaranamavatu etukalaic cumakkum kalutaiyin utaranattirku oppakum, eccamukattar allahvin vacanankalaip poyppikkirarkalo avarkalin utaranam mikak kettatakum - allah aniyayakkara camukattarai nervaliyil celuttamattan
